content.raw: I found a couple of instances where we use `unique_ptr` on `QDialog`s though. One within a [function](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/d3b06088be22a15a25025a952414bffb8ff6aa2b/gazebo/gui/MainWindow.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#MainWindow.cc-565) and another as a member [variable](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/d3b06088be22a15a25025a952414bffb8ff6aa2b/gazebo/gui/building/BuildingMakerPrivate.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#BuildingMakerPrivate.hh-111). I believe these two cases are slightly different from each other, what do you think of them? Can we just happily use raw pointers instead?
